title: BlackRock Profit Rose 23% in Third Quarter
sub_head: Money-management firm beat analysts’ earnings expectations as revenue grew 16%
body:
BlackRock Inc.’s third-quarter profit rose 23% during a volatile stretch for markets.
The money-management company posted a profit of $1.68 billion, or $10.89 a share, for the quarter ended September, up from  $1.36 billion, or $8.87 a share, a year earlier. The company beat  analysts’ profit expectations.
